creator: barvas@gmail.com
text: While I'm getting "Re-negotiation handshake failed: Not accepted by client!?" error, I still can't catch this error using ErrorDocument 403 directive.

This is not a bug. When re-negotiation has failed, the connection is already closed and there is no way to send an error document to the client.

It would be the job of the browser to display a meaningful error message (although I don't know of any browser that does that right).
creator: sf@sfritsch.de
